item.title: 21/04 - Basic knowledge of HTML
item.description: Preparations Watch these Videos The following video from Khan Academy's Internet 101 series will give you a high-level overview of how HTTP and HTML works. HTTP and HTML - 7:07 What is a web browser? What does HTTP stand for? How does it work? What is it used for? What is HTML? What is a GET request? What is a POST request? What is a cookie? What are SSL and TLS?
